dmca.title: Dot Com Infoway claims misappropriation
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Sub: Infringement Notification - reg.

We are a reputed ISO certified Software and Web Development Company based in India. 

Our Corporate Website: www.dci.in

This communication is to bring to your notice about the copyright Infringed by the following website -- www.kitinc.com. Sections of our portfolio have been stolen by the said company and this infringement implies/claims that the work we have done for our clients is done by the said company. Please find the sample of reference URLs that exhibit infringement below in comparison with our website URLs.

The work at issue -
http://www.kitinc.com/web/asp.htm
http://www.kitinc.com/web/asp_net.htm
http://www.kitinc.com/web/cold_fusion.htm
http://www.kitinc.com/web/php.htm
http://www.kitinc.com/web/specialtyservices.htm

Original content in our website
http://www.dci.in/aspweb.asp
http://www.dci.in/dotnetweb.asp
http://www.dci.in/coldfusionweb.asp
http://www.dci.in/phpweb.asp
http://www.dci.in/specialty_services.asp

The above infringement affects our business a great deal leading to revenue loss. We will appreciate your immediate attention to resolve this issue at the earliest possible.

For any clarifications please feel free to contact us at +91-44-42620000 or email at [private]@dci.in.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thanking you,
Yours faithfully,
For Dot Com Infoway Ltd. 
[signed]
[private]
Chief Executive Officer
